meta.title: Dental Implants and Prostheses | Dr. S√≠lvio Ara√∫jo - Dental Clinic
meta.description: Dental implants, fixed and removable prostheses. Complete solutions for missing teeth at Dr. S√≠lvio Ara√∫jo Clinic.

hero.subtitle: Restore your ability to chew, speak and smile with confidence. Modern and durable solutions for missing teeth.
hero.imageAlt: Dental implants and prostheses at Dr. S√≠lvio Ara√∫jo Clinic

servicesSection.title: Solutions For Missing Teeth
servicesSection.subtitle: We offer several options to restore your smile, tailored to your needs.

implantes.title: Dental Implants
implantes.description: Permanent and natural solution to replace lost teeth. Implants are artificial titanium roots that support dental crowns.

fixas.title: Fixed Prostheses
fixas.description: Fixed bridges and crowns cemented on natural teeth or implants, offering maximum stability and comfort.

removiveis.title: Removable Prostheses
removiveis.description: Flexible and economical removable solutions to replace multiple teeth, with high-quality materials.

processSection.title: The Implant Placement Process
processSection.subtitle: A well-planned treatment for exceptional results.

01.title: Initial Evaluation
01.description: Complete examination with X-rays and CT scan to assess bone structure.

02.title: Digital Planning
02.description: Creation of a personalized treatment plan with 3D technology.

03.title: Placement Surgery
03.description: Minimally invasive procedure for implant placement.

04.title: Healing Period
04.description: 3-6 months for complete osseointegration of the implant to the bone.

05.title: Crown Placement
05.description: Installation of the definitive crown, customized for your smile.

1.a: The procedure is performed with local anesthesia, being virtually painless. Post-operative involves mild discomfort controlled with medication.

2.q: How long does an implant last?
2.a: With proper care, an implant can last a lifetime. The success rate is over 95%.

3.q: Can I get implants if I have little bone?
3.a: Yes, there are bone grafting techniques and special implants for cases of bone resorption.

finalCta.title: Restore Your Complete Smile
finalCta.subtitle: Schedule a free evaluation consultation and discover the best solution for your case.

hero.title: Consultation and Diagnosis
hero.subtitle: Complete and accurate evaluation of your oral health

consultation.title: Dental Consultation
consultation.description: The dental consultation is the first step to ensure a healthy mouth.
consultation.content: During the consultation, the dentist performs a detailed evaluation of your oral health, analyzing teeth, gums, bite, and oral tissues. The goal is to identify existing problems or prevent future complications, creating a personalized treatment plan.

radiology.title: Digital X-rays
radiology.content: Digital X-rays allow visualization of internal structures of teeth and bones that are not visible to the naked eye. They are fast, safe, and use a minimal dose of radiation, helping in the diagnosis of cavities, infections, bone problems, and treatment planning.

emergency.title: Dental Emergencies
emergency.description: Quick care when you need it most
emergency.content: We consider dental emergencies: intense pain, infections, trauma, dental fractures, persistent bleeding or swelling. In these cases, contact the clinic as soon as possible. While waiting for evaluation, avoid excessive self-medication and, in case of bleeding, apply gentle pressure with clean gauze.

faq.title: Frequently
faq.description: Find answers to the most common questions about our services.

item1.question: What payment methods are accepted?
item1.answer: We accept cash, debit/credit card, MB Way and bank transfer. We also offer payment facilities for more extensive treatments.

item2.question: Does the clinic have parking?
item2.answer: Yes, there is free parking in the surrounding area of the clinic, with easy access.

item3.question: How often should I go to the dentist?
item3.answer: We recommend routine consultations every 6 months for oral health maintenance and early detection of problems.

item4.question: Is the first consultation free?
item4.answer: Yes, we offer a free evaluation consultation for new patients, where we assess your situation and present a treatment plan.

item5.question: Do you attend emergencies?
item5.answer: Yes, we reserve daily slots for dental emergencies. In case of emergency, contact us by phone for priority scheduling.

item6.question: Do you treat children?
item6.answer: Yes, we have experience in pediatric dentistry and create a welcoming environment so that the little ones feel comfortable during consultations.
